document.full_text: authorities on monday arrested a man believed to be responsible for a bomb blast outside a los angeles-area synagogue, after a manhunt that began in california and ended in ohio, the fbi said.
document.title: synagogue blast suspect arrested in ohio: fbi
lines_and_colors: authorities on monday arrested a man believed to be responsible for a bomb blast outside a los angeles-area synagogue, after a manhunt that began in california and ended in ohio, the fbi said.
